text: Carlos Barahona Angulo (born January 20, 1980 in Bugalagrande, Valle del Cauca) is a Colombian goalkeeper. He currently plays for San José in the Liga de Fútbol Profesional Boliviano. He was a member of the Colombian U-19 and U-21 National Teams. He is the older brother of Julián Barahona who plays midfield for Patriotas FC. ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Valle del Cauca Department Category:Colombian footballers Category:Cortuluá footballers Category:Deportivo Pasto footballers Category:Atlético Nacional footballers Category:Envigado F.C. players Category:Cúcuta Deportivo footballers Category:Club San José players Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Bolivian Primera División players Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Bolivia Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Carlos Barahona
